verses.plain: Rejoice not, O Israel, for joy, as other people: for thou hast gone a whoring from thy God, thou hast loved a reward upon every cornfloor.

tokens.t: Rejoice not, O Israel, for joy, as
people: for thou hast gone a whoring from thy God, thou hast loved a reward upon every cornfloor.

verses.plain: The floor and the winepress shall not feed them, and the new wine shall fail in her.

tokens.t: The floor and the winepress shall not feed them, and the new wine shall fail in her.

verses.plain: They shall not dwell in the LORD’s land; but Ephraim shall return to Egypt, and they shall eat unclean things in Assyria.

tokens.t: They shall not dwell in the
land; but Ephraim shall return to Egypt, and they shall eat unclean
in Assyria.

verses.plain: They shall not offer wine offerings to the LORD, neither shall they be pleasing unto him: their sacrifices shall be unto them as the bread of mourners; all that eat thereof shall be polluted: for their bread for their soul shall not come into the house of the LORD.

tokens.t: They shall not offer wine
to the
, neither shall they be pleasing unto him: their sacrifices
unto them as the bread of mourners; all that eat thereof shall be polluted: for their bread for their soul shall not come into the house of the

verses.plain: What will ye do in the solemn day, and in the day of the feast of the LORD?

tokens.t: What will ye do in the solemn day, and in the day of the feast of the

verses.plain: For, lo, they are gone because of destruction: Egypt shall gather them up, Memphis shall bury them: the pleasant places for their silver, nettles shall possess them: thorns shall be in their tabernacles.

tokens.t: For, lo, they are gone because of destruction: Egypt shall gather them up, Memphis shall bury them: the pleasant
for their silver, nettles shall possess them: thorns
in their tabernacles.

verses.plain: The days of visitation are come, the days of recompence are come; Israel shall know it: the prophet is a fool, the spiritual man is mad, for the multitude of thine iniquity, and the great hatred.

tokens.t: The days of visitation are come, the days of recompence are come; Israel shall know
the prophet
a fool, the spiritual man
mad, for the multitude of thine iniquity, and the great hatred.

verses.plain: The watchman of Ephraim was with my God: but the prophet is a snare of a fowler in all his ways, and hatred in the house of his God.

tokens.t: The watchman of Ephraim
with my God:
the prophet
a snare of a fowler in all his ways,
hatred in the house of his God.

verses.plain: They have deeply corrupted themselves, as in the days of Gibeah: therefore he will remember their iniquity, he will visit their sins.

tokens.t: They have deeply corrupted
, as in the days of Gibeah:
he will remember their iniquity, he will visit their sins.

verses.plain: I found Israel like grapes in the wilderness; I saw your fathers as the firstripe in the fig tree at her first time: but they went to Baal-peor, and separated themselves unto that shame; and their abominations were according as they loved.

tokens.t: I found Israel like grapes in the wilderness; I saw your fathers as the firstripe in the fig tree at her first time:
they went to Baal-peor, and separated themselves unto
shame; and
abominations were according as they loved.

verses.plain: As for Ephraim, their glory shall fly away like a bird, from the birth, and from the womb, and from the conception.

tokens.t: Ephraim, their glory shall fly away like a bird, from the birth, and from the womb, and from the conception.

verses.plain: Though they bring up their children, yet will I bereave them, that there shall not be a man left: yea, woe also to them when I depart from them!

tokens.t: Though they bring up their children, yet will I bereave them,
not
a man
yea, woe also to them when I depart from them!

verses.plain: Ephraim, as I saw Tyrus, is planted in a pleasant place: but Ephraim shall bring forth his children to the murderer.

tokens.t: Ephraim, as I saw Tyrus,
planted in a pleasant place: but Ephraim shall bring forth his children to the murderer.

verses.plain: Give them, O LORD: what wilt thou give? give them a miscarrying womb and dry breasts.

tokens.t: Give them, O
: what wilt thou give? give them a miscarrying womb and dry breasts.

verses.plain: All their wickedness is in Gilgal: for there I hated them: for the wickedness of their doings I will drive them out of mine house, I will love them no more: all their princes are revolters.

tokens.t: All their wickedness
in Gilgal: for there I hated them: for the wickedness of their doings I will drive them out of mine house, I will love them no more: all their princes
revolters.

verses.plain: Ephraim is smitten, their root is dried up, they shall bear no fruit: yea, though they bring forth, yet will I slay even the beloved fruit of their womb.

tokens.t: Ephraim is smitten, their root is dried up, they shall bear no fruit: yea, though they bring forth, yet will I slay
the beloved
of their womb.

verses.plain: My God will cast them away, because they did not hearken unto him: and they shall be wanderers among the nations.

tokens.t: My God will cast them away, because they did not hearken unto him: and they shall be wanderers among the nations.

footnotes.text: the…: or, their silver shall be desired, the nettle, etc.: Heb. the desire
spiritual…: Heb. man of the spirit
miscarrying: Heb. that casteth the fruit
